Text:
Ack... What's with this fire?!
Why can't we put it out?!

Reporting in! The flames surrounding the village seem
to have started from something like slime!
Slime?!

We're not sure how, but the entire village is
surrounded by this slime, and it's making the
flames!
Get rid of it, then!

We're trying, but the slime seems to be defending
itself―
Gah!!
What?!
Fr-From...this distance?!

Damn it! What is the meaning of this?! It's like the
flames have a will of their―
No will... It just...attacks...automatically!
You...!

So many...guinea pigs today... Great day for
experimenting...
Gaaah!!
Don't panic! Keep your magic defenses up!

...As expected. Its attacks aren't very accurate in
it's current state...

To figure this out... Need to manually correct the
data... Convert results for improvements...

Huh?! You're the one manipulating the damn slime?!
Then we just need to kill you!
I can read your moves!
Its defense needs to be more...precise...
Die, apostate!
Hey, don't space out!
I wasn't...spacing out... I was waiting...for you...
Huh?!
This experiment...requires precise magic control.

Oh... Well, I thought as much! And don't call me out
so easily!

If you care so much...about your secrets...go
ahead...and wipe them out.

Huh?! Such arrogance! We will bring our Goddess's
judgement on you!
You want judgement, I will lay some down on you!
Now for the finishing blow!
Wait. Killing him quick...is a waste.
Excuse me?!

I am setting it up. Operating the slime, killing.
I want fresh data.
...Wait a sec. Was that why you were waiting for me?

My, oh my, really...I don't know whether to say
you're self-centered or you're too laid back.
Wh-What are you―!
Argh!

You guys and your magic defenses. I mean, they're
probably strong against physical attacks...

But attacking isn't just cutting, jabbing and
hitting, now is it?
Wha—?! It...It moved!

Eta, what do you want to do with him? Any requests
apart from wringing him to a pulp?
Go ahead and grill him...
W-Wait!
Burn him at the stake. Roger that.
GAAAAAA!!!

Looks like magical defense is strong against physical
attacks but it's pretty useless against high
temperatures.

...I want to...improve slime... Make it do that...
automatically.

Well, right now, I would say that the slime "wall"
surrounding the village is pretty handy...

If the wall could move more precisely and kill enemies,
then that would actually be really useful.

...Hold on, if it becomes more precise, then my
strongest skill will be replaced by slime?!
I...don't really care...about that.
That's bad! Eta, no more research on slime!
Huhhh...?!
Anyway, enough chatting!
Don't let the...guinea pigs escape... Hehe.
